mapper.insert: insert into post_comment (post_id, member_id, content) values (#{postId}, #{memberId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select pc.id, pc.post_id, pc.member_id, m.login_id, pc.content, pc.modified_date from post_comment pc join post p on pc.post_id = p.id join member m on pc.member_id = m.id and pc.post_id = #{postId}
